post:
Edit: Server taken

<del>hi there, i felt like ordering a server from Digicube to see how good their setup times were (absolutely horrible btw)
so, now i have a 
Dual Core Atom Server.
1gb Ram 
160GB hdd
Unmetered @ 100mbit
just sittin here doing not much..

someone give me a good reason to give it to them and it's theirs for the month, and if they wanna continue it they can just pay me the fee's through BuyDedi.com as it all just goes on the company card. :)

</del>
Some Tests:

CPU: `CPU: 2 x Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU 230 @ 1.60GHz`

Speedtest: 
![](http://www.speedtest.net/result/3051190220.png)

HDD:

[root@digi00065 ~]# dd if=/dev/zero of=/tmp/output bs=8k count=10k; rm -f /tmp/output
10240+0 enregistrements lus

Currently has Fresh Centos 6 32bit on it, but can do whatever Digicube has to offer.
